Player History
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Bill Graham (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1969, off Rollie Fingers (NYY)...
Injured on 8/7/1969 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1971 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 6/20/1971...
Traded from Baltimore to New York (A) on 7/7/1971 (Going to NYY: RF R. Gagliano. Going to BAL: 2B R. Burleson)...
Injured on 7/1/1972 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 9/28/1972 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1975, hitting .625 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
